definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: In the third place, the article is to expound the current significance of Lin Yutang's esthetic thought of life art.
sentences.chinese: 三是阐发林语堂生活艺术论美学思想的当下意义。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, after chewing it for a bit, he found it sweetish and rather pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 当下伸手接过，咬了一口，咀嚼之下，倒也甘美可口。

sentences.english: That's certainly the prevailing view of marriage, American style, in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 这确实是2009年当下最普遍的美国式婚姻观。

sentences.english: He was completely and entirely in the present.
sentences.chinese: 他完全彻底地活在当下。

sentences.english: The ater-style wedding is now a new style of wedding ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 剧院式婚礼是当下一种新兴的时尚婚礼仪式。

sentences.english: Just let go and let yourself be in the moment.
sentences.chinese: 只是放开并让自己处在当下时刻。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Li Dazhao said that today is most precious.
sentences.chinese: 同时，李大钊说过，当下是最宝贵的。

sentences.english: Bakshi: What would you recommend to political actors in Japan right now?
sentences.chinese: 你对政治人物的当下的建议是什么呢？

sentences.english: But the feeling that what is now is real has never changed, even in dream.
sentences.chinese: 但即使梦中，那当下如是的感觉从来不变。

sentences.english: To find the name of the working directory, use the pwd command.
sentences.chinese: 可以用pwd命令，显示出你当下目录的路径信息。

sentences.english: To sacrifice moments in your life now for those that are dead and gone is a wasteful endeavor.
sentences.chinese: 为了已经逝去的过往牺牲生命中当下的时间是徒劳的。

sentences.english: "Acceptance of the present moment has nothing to do with resignation," writes Kabat-Zinn.
sentences.chinese: “接受当下时刻与顺从无关，”卡巴金写道。

sentences.english: Unhappiness or problems cannot survive in the Now.
sentences.chinese: 所有不快乐或苦恼，都难以在当下活存。

sentences.english: But when I knew this time, I saw straight away that turning over the hand is Rupa and Nama.
sentences.chinese: 但当我这次了悟时，我当下见到翻转手臂是色与名。

sentences.english: Flowers are destined to bloom and fade, It's best to enjoy living in the present.
sentences.chinese: 花开花落自然事，活在当下最自然。

sentences.english: Ring the bell of the present, and you will hear the distant echoes of the infinite past and future.
sentences.chinese: 敲响当下的钟，你会听到遥远的过去和未来的回声。

definition: main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
